summary.span: 提供对“消息队列”服务器上的队列的访问。

span.span: Provides access to a queue on a Message Queuing server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列技术允许在不同时间运行的应用程序能够跨异类网络和可能暂时脱机的系统进行通信。The Message Queuing technology allows applications running at different times to communicate across heterogeneous networks and systems that might be temporarily offline. 应用程序发送、 接收或查看队列中的 （而不删除其读取） 消息。Applications send, receive, or peek (read without removing) messages from queues. 消息队列是一个可选组件的[!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]和 Windows NT，必须单独安装。Message Queuing is an optional component of [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)] and Windows NT, and must be installed separately. 类是包装消息队列。The class is a wrapper around Message Queuing. 有多个版本的消息队列，并使用类可能会导致略有不同的行为，具体取决于操作系统所使用。There are multiple versions of Message Queuing, and using the class can result in slightly different behavior, depending on the operating system you are using. 每个版本的消息队列的特定功能的信息，请参阅 MSDN 中的平台 SDK 中的"什么是消息队列中的新增功能"主题。For information about specific features of each version of Message Queuing, see the topic "What's New in Message Queuing" in the Platform SDK in MSDN. 类提供对消息队列的队列的引用。The class provides a reference to a Message Queuing queue. 您可以指定在路径构造函数，以连接到现有资源，也可以在服务器上创建一个新队列。You can specify a path in the constructor to connect to an existing resource, or you can create a new queue on the server. 可以调用之前， ，或，则必须将关联的新实例与现有队列的类。Before you can call , , or , you must associate the new instance of the class with an existing queue. 此时，如操作队列的属性和。At that point, you can manipulate the queue properties such as and . 支持两种类型的消息检索： 同步和异步。 supports two types of message retrieval: synchronous and asynchronous. 同步方法和，会导致进程线程等待新消息到达队列中指定的时间间隔。The synchronous methods, and , cause the process thread to wait a specified time interval for a new message to arrive in the queue. 异步方法中，和，允许以继续在另一个线程，直到有消息到达队列中的主应用程序任务。The asynchronous methods, and , allow the main application tasks to continue in a separate thread until a message arrives in the queue. 这些方法通过使用回调对象和状态对象将在线程之间的信息进行工作。These methods work by using callback objects and state objects to communicate information between threads. 当你创建的新实例类，不会创建一个新的消息队列队列。When you create a new instance of the class, you are not creating a new Message Queuing queue. 相反，可以使用， ，和方法，用于管理服务器上的队列。Instead, you can use the , , and methods to manage queues on the server. 与不同，并是`static`成员，因此可以调用这些方法而无需创建的新实例类。Unlike , and are `static` members, so you can call them without creating a new instance of the class. 可以设置对象的具有三个名称的一个属性： 友好名称， ，或。You can set the object's property with one of three names: the friendly name, the , or the . 定义的队列的友好名称并属性，是 \\ 对于公用队列，和 \\ `Private$` \\ 用于专用队列。The friendly name, which is defined by the queue's and properties, is \\ for a public queue, and \\`Private$`\\ for a private queue. 属性允许脱机访问消息队列。The property allows offline access to message queues. 最后，可以使用队列属性来设置队列的。Lastly, you can use the queue's property to set the queue's . 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建新对象使用各种路径名称语法类型。The following code example creates new objects using various path name syntax types. 每种情况下，它将一条消息发送到队列的构造函数中定义的路径。In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CPP/mqpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CS/mqpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/VB/mqpath.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例将消息发送到队列，并从队列中，使用名为的特定于应用程序的类接收消息`Order`。The following code example sends a message to a queue, and receives a message from a queue, using an application-specific class called `Order`. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CPP/mqreceive_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CS/mqreceive_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/VB/mqreceive_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载来创建的新实例不立即绑定到消息队列服务器上的队列的类。Use this overload to create a new instance of the class that is not immediately tied to a queue on the Message Queuing server. 使用此实例前，您必须将其连接到现有消息队列队列通过设置属性。Before using this instance, you must connect it to an existing Message Queuing queue by setting the property. 或者，可以设置引用方法的返回值，从而创建一个新的消息队列队列。Alternatively, you can set the reference to the method's return value, thereby creating a new Message Queuing queue. 构造函数实例化的新实例类; 它不会创建一个新的消息队列队列。The constructor instantiates a new instance of the class; it does not create a new Message Queuing queue. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class. 所有筛选器值设置为`true`。All the filter values are set to `true`.| ||`false`| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新。The following code example creates a new . remarks.format:
## Remarks 当你想要将新使用此重载实例与特定消息队列的队列，并为其知道路径、 格式名称或标签。Use this overload when you want to tie the new instance to a particular Message Queuing queue, for which you know the path, format name, or label. 如果你想要授予独占访问第一个应用程序引用的队列，则必须设置属性设置为`true`或使用传递的读取访问权限限制参数的构造函数。If you want to grant exclusive access to the first application that references the queue, you must set the property to `true` or use the constructor that passes a read-access restriction parameter. 构造函数实例化的新实例类; 它不会创建一个新的消息队列队列。The constructor instantiates a new instance of the class; it does not create a new Message Queuing queue. 若要在消息队列中创建一个新队列，使用。To create a new queue in Message Queuing, use . 语法`path`参数取决于队列的类型它的引用下, 表中所示。The syntax of the `path` parameter depends on the type of queue it references, as shown in the following table. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日记队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日志队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 或者，可以使用或来描述的队列路径下, 表中所示。Alternatively, you can use the or to describe the queue path, as shown in the following table. |参考Reference|语法Syntax|示例Example| |---------------|------------|-------------| |格式名称Format name|`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]|`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112

`FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |LabelLabel|`Label:` [ *label* ]`Label:` [ *label* ]|`Label:` TheLabel`Label:` TheLabel| 若要在脱机工作，必须使用格式名语法，而不是路径名称语法的构造函数。To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, not the path name syntax for the constructor. 否则，因为主域控制器不可用，将路径解析为格式名，将引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller is not available to resolve the path to the format name. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . 这些值基于消息队列队列的属性与指定的路径`path`参数。These values are based on the properties of the Message Queuing queue with the path specified by the `path` parameter. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||00| ||| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||`true`如果消息队列队列的隐私级别设置为"正文";否则为`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing queue's privacy level setting is "Body"; otherwise, `false`.| ||| ||| ||消息队列队列的计算机名称属性的值。The value of the Message Queuing queue's computer name property.| ||| ||| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||如果未设置的构造函数。, if not set by the constructor.| ||如果未设置的构造函数。, if not set by the constructor.| ||`false`| ||`true`如果启用消息队列对象的日志设置;否则为`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing object's journal setting is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建新对象使用各种路径名称语法类型。The following code example creates new objects using various path name syntax types. 每种情况下，它将一条消息发送到队列的构造函数中定义的路径。In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CPP/mqpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CS/mqpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/VB/mqpath.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当你想要将新使用此重载到特定消息队列的队列，并为其知道路径、 格式名称或标签。Use this overload when you want to tie the new to a particular Message Queuing queue, for which you know the path, format name, or label. 如果你想要授予独占访问第一个应用程序的引用的队列，设置`sharedModeDenyReceive`参数`true`。If you want to grant exclusive access to the first application that references the queue, set the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter to `true`. 否则，设置`sharedModeDenyReceive`到`false`或使用仅具有构造函数`path`参数。Otherwise, set `sharedModeDenyReceive` to `false` or use the constructor that has only a `path` parameter. 设置`sharedModeDenyReceive`到`true`影响访问消息队列队列，包括其他应用程序的所有对象。Setting `sharedModeDenyReceive` to `true` affects all objects that access the Message Queuing queue, including other applications. 参数的效果不会限制对此应用程序。The effects of the parameter are not restricted to this application. 构造函数创建的新实例类; 它不会创建一个新的消息队列队列。The constructor creates a new instance of the class; it does not create a new Message Queuing queue. 若要在消息队列中创建一个新队列，使用。To create a new queue in Message Queuing, use . 语法`path`参数取决于队列的类型。The syntax of the `path` parameter depends on the type of queue. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日记队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日志队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 或者，可以使用的格式名称或消息队列的队列的标签来描述的队列路径。Alternatively, you can use the format name or label of a Message Queuing queue to describe the queue path. |参考Reference|语法Syntax|示例Example| |---------------|------------|-------------| |格式名称Format name|`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]|`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112

`FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |LabelLabel|`Label:` [ *label* ]`Label:` [ *label* ]|`Label:` TheLabel`Label:` TheLabel| 若要在脱机工作，必须使用格式名语法，而不是友好名称语法。To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, rather than the friendly name syntax. 否则，因为主域控制器 （Active Directory 所在） 不是可用于将路径解析为格式名，将引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller (on which Active Directory resides) is not available to resolve the path to the format name. 如果打开一个队列`sharedModeDenyReceive`参数设置为`true`，则所有，随后尝试从队列中读取生成由于共享冲突。If a opens a queue with the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter set to `true`, any that subsequently tries to read from the queue generates a because of a sharing violation. 一个也会引发，如果尝试访问队列中排他模式，而另一个已具有到队列的非独占访问。A is also thrown if a tries to access the queue in exclusive mode while another already has non-exclusive access to the queue. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . 这些值基于属性的消息队列队列中，使用指定的路径`path`参数。These values are based on the properties of the Message Queuing queue, with the path specified by the `path` parameter. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`。`false`.| ||0.0.| ||。.| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||`true`如果消息队列队列的隐私级别设置为"正文";否则为`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing queue's privacy level setting is "Body"; otherwise, `false`.| ||。.| ||。.| ||消息队列队列的计算机名称属性的值。The value of the Message Queuing queue's computer name property.| ||。.| ||。.| ||设置的默认构造函数的值类。The values set by the default constructor of the class.| ||如果未设置的构造函数。, if not set by the constructor.| ||如果未设置的构造函数。, if not set by the constructor.| ||`sharedModeDenyReceive` 参数的值。The value of the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter.| ||`true`如果启用消息队列对象的日志设置;否则为`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing object's journal setting is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新具有独占访问权，设置其路径，并将消息发送到队列。The following code example creates a new with exclusive access, sets its path, and sends a message to the queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive/CPP/mqctor_denysharedreceive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive/CS/mqctor_denysharedreceive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive/VB/mqctor_denysharedreceive.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息身份验证提供了一种方法来确保消息的完整性并验证消息发件人。Message authentication provides a way to ensure message integrity and to verify who sent the message. 若要请求身份验证，发送应用程序设置消息的身份验证级别。To request authentication, the sending application sets the message's authentication level. 当您将设置到`true`，可将在服务器上，不只与此队列的访问权限实例。When you set to `true`, you are restricting access to the queue on the server, not only to this instance. 使用针对相同的消息队列队列的所有客户端会受到影响。All clients working against the same Message Queuing queue will be affected. 只接受经过身份验证的消息队列将拒绝未经身份验证的消息。A queue that accepts only authenticated messages will reject a non-authenticated message. 若要请求消息遭到拒绝的通知，发送应用程序可以设置消息属性。To request notification of message rejection, a sending application can set the property of the message. 由于存在其他不表明消息遭到拒绝的因此发送应用程序可能会丢失消息，除非请求，它将发送到死信队列。Because no other indication of message rejection exists, the sending application can lose the message unless you request that it be sent to the dead-letter queue. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的值的消息队列的属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列的基本优先级指定如何传送的消息队列在通过网络传输时被处理的。A message queue's base priority specifies how a message en route to that queue is treated as it travels through the network. 可以设置属性来授予到所有消息发送到指定比发送到其他队列的队列的更高版本或更低优先级。You can set the property to confer a higher or lower priority to all messages sent to the specified queue than those sent to other queues. 设置此属性修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他更改会影响实例。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 消息队列无关消息，它指定在其中传入消息放置在队列中的顺序的属性。A message queue's is not related to the property of a message, which specifies the order in which an incoming message is placed in the queue. 应用使用的格式名称指定其路径仅为公共队列。 applies only to public queues whose paths are specified using the format name. 专用队列的基本优先级始终为零 (0)。The base priority of a private queue is always zero (0). 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的值的消息队列的属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理，您将使用引发一条消息在队列中可用时的事件。In asynchronous processing, you use to raise the event when a message becomes available in the queue. 也会引发如果一条消息在队列中已存在。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 若要使用、 创建的事件处理程序处理异步操作的结果，并将其与事件委托。To use , create an event handler that processes the results of the asynchronous operation, and associate it with your event delegate. 启动异步查看操作;通知，通过引发事件时，如果有消息到达队列中。 initiates an asynchronous peek operation; the is notified, through the raising of the event, when a message arrives in the queue. 然后通过调用访问消息或通过检索结果使用。The can then access the message by calling or by retrieving the result using the . 方法将立即返回，但直到调用事件处理程序，则不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 因为是异步的您可以调用它查看队列，而不会阻止当前线程的执行。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to peek the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要以同步方式查看队列，使用方法。To synchronously peek the queue, use the method. 异步操作完成后，可以调用或再次在事件处理程序以继续接收通知。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. 的返回标识方法启动的异步操作。The that returns identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 可以使用此的整个生存期内操作，尽管您通常不使用它直到调用。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果启动多个异步操作，你可以放置其值数组中，并指定是否要等待的所有操作或任何操作完成。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，使用属性的来标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 如果是`false`，则引发完成事件，但调用时，将引发异常。If is `false`, the completion event is raised, but an exception will be thrown when calling . 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建名为一个事件处理程序`MyPeekCompleted`，将其附加到事件处理程序委托，然后调用启动异步查看操作上的队列的路径处"。 \myQueue"。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 当引发事件，该示例查看的消息并将其正文写入到屏幕。When a event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen. 该示例然后调用再次以启动新的异步查看操作。The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation. the event is not raised. 其他重载依赖于此组件以引发事件。The other overloads of rely on this component to raise the event. 也会引发如果一条消息在队列中已存在。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 方法将立即返回，但直到调用事件处理程序，则不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 因为是异步的您可以调用它查看队列，而不会阻止当前线程的执行。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to peek the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要以同步方式查看队列，使用方法。To synchronously peek the queue, use the method. 异步操作完成后，可以调用或再次在事件处理程序以继续接收通知。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. 返回标识方法启动的异步操作。 returns a that identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 可以使用此的整个生存期内操作，尽管您通常不使用它直到调用。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果启动多个异步操作，你可以放置其值数组中，并指定是否要等待的所有操作或任何操作完成。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，使用属性的来标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 状态对象将与操作相关联的状态信息。The state object associates state information with the operation. 例如，如果您调用多次启动多个操作，你可以指定通过单独的状态对象定义的每个操作。For example, if you call multiple times to initiate multiple operations, you can identify each operation through a separate state object that you define. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个异步查看操作。The following code example creates an asynchronous peek operation. 代码示例将消息发送到本地消息队列，然后调用，并传入： 十秒的超时值; 标识该特定消息; 和的新实例的唯一整数，用于标识事件处理程序`MyPeekCompleted`.The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls , passing in: a time-out value of ten seconds; a unique integer that identifies that particular message; and a new instance of that identifies the event handler, `MyPeekCompleted`. 当引发事件，事件处理程序查看的消息，并在屏幕上写入消息正文和整数消息标识符。When a event is raised, the event handler peeks at the message and writes the message body and the integer message identifier to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理，您将使用引发事件时从队列中删除一条消息。In asynchronous processing, you use to raise the event when a message has been removed from the queue. 也会引发如果一条消息在队列中已存在。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 若要使用、 创建的事件处理程序处理异步操作的结果，并将其与事件委托。To use , create an event handler that processes the results of the asynchronous operation and associate it with your event delegate. 启动异步接收操作;通知，通过引发事件时，如果有消息到达队列中。 initiates an asynchronous receive operation; the is notified, through the raising of the event, when a message arrives in the queue. 然后通过调用访问消息。The can then access the message by calling . 方法将立即返回，但直到调用事件处理程序，则不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 因为是异步的您可以调用它可接收来自队列的消息，而不会阻止当前线程的执行。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to receive a message from the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要以同步方式接收一条消息，使用方法。To synchronously receive a message, use the method. 异步操作完成后，可以调用或再次在事件处理程序以继续接收通知。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. 的返回标识方法启动的异步操作。The that returns identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 可以使用此的整个生存期内操作，尽管您通常不使用它直到调用。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果启动多个异步操作，你可以放置其值数组中，并指定是否要等待的所有操作或任何操作完成。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，使用属性的来标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 如果是`false`，则引发完成事件，但调用时，将引发异常。If is `false`, the completion event is raised, but an exception will be thrown when calling . 不使用异步调用与事务。Do not use the asynchronous call with transactions. 如果你想要执行的事务的异步操作，调用，并将该事务和 （同步） 放查看操作中创建的事件处理程序方法。If you want to perform a transactional asynchronous operation, call , and put the transaction and the (synchronous) method within the event handler you create for the peek operation. 事件处理程序可能包含的功能，如下面的 C# 代码中所示。Your event handler might contain functionality as shown in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.BeginTransaction(); myMessageQueue.Receive(); myMessageQueue.CommitTransaction(); ``` 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例链接异步请求。The following code example chains asynchronous requests. 它假定名为"myQueue"的本地计算机上没有队列。It assumes there is a queue on the local computer called "myQueue". `Main`函数启动异步操作由处理`MyReceiveCompleted`例程。The `Main` function begins the asynchronous operation that is handled by the `MyReceiveCompleted` routine. `MyReceiveCompleted` 处理当前消息并开始一个新异步接收操作。`MyReceiveCompleted` processes the current message and begins a new asynchronous receive operation. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CPP/mqbeginreceive_noparms_mre.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CS/mqbeginreceive_noparms_mre.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/VB/mqbeginreceive_noparms_mre.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例将异步请求排队。The following code example queues asynchronous requests. 在调用使用其返回值中。The call to uses the in its return value. `Main`例程等待所有异步操作完成后才退出。The `Main` routine waits for all asynchronous operations to be completed before exiting. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CPP/mqbeginreceive_noparms_wh.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CS/mqbeginreceive_noparms_wh.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/VB/mqbeginreceive_noparms_wh.vb#2)]

generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果启动多个异步操作，你可以放置其值数组中，并指定是否要等待的所有操作或任何操作完成。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，使用属性的来标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 此重载指定超时和状态对象。This overload specifies a time-out and a state object. 如果指定的间隔`timeout`参数过期，则此组件将产生事件。If the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter expires, this component raises the event. 因为没有消息，随后调用将引发异常。Because no message exists, a subsequent call to will throw an exception. 状态对象将与操作相关联的状态信息。The state object associates state information with the operation. 例如，如果您调用多次启动多个操作，你可以指定通过单独的状态对象定义的每个操作。For example, if you call multiple times to initiate multiple operations, you can identify each operation through a separate state object that you define. 状态对象还可用于进程线程中传递信息。You can also use the state object to pass information across process threads. 如果线程已启动，但回调是在另一个线程在异步方案中，状态对象是封送，并从该事件返回与信息一起传递。If a thread is started but the callback is on a different thread in an asynchronous scenario, the state object is marshaled and passed back along with information from the event. 不使用异步调用与事务。Do not use the asynchronous call with transactions. 如果你想要执行的事务的异步操作，调用，并将该事务和 （同步） 放查看操作中创建的事件处理程序方法。If you want to perform a transactional asynchronous operation, call , and put the transaction and the (synchronous) method within the event handler you create for the peek operation. 事件处理程序可能包含的功能，如下面的 C# 代码中所示。Your event handler might contain functionality as shown in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.BeginTransaction(); myMessageQueue.Receive(); myMessageQueue.CommitTransaction(); ``` 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The creates an asynchronous receive operation. 该代码示例创建一个事件处理程序`MyReceiveCompleted`，并将其附加到事件处理程序委托。The code example creates an event handler, `MyReceiveCompleted`, and attaches it to the event handler delegate. 代码示例将消息发送到本地消息队列，然后调用、 传入超时值为 10 秒并标识该特定消息的唯一整数。The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls , passing in a time-out value of ten seconds and a unique integer that identifies that particular message. 当引发事件、 事件处理程序接收消息，并在屏幕上写入消息正文和整数消息标识符。When a event is raised, the event handler receives the message and writes the message body and the integer message identifier to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示应用程序是否能够查看或从队列接收消息。 indicates whether the application is able to peek or receive messages from the queue. 如果是`true`，则可以接收或查看队列中的消息。If is `true`, the can receive or peek messages from the queue. 否则，不能。Otherwise, it cannot. 是`false`如果队列已打开具有独占读取访问权限 (或如果它是开放的非独占访问，这请求独占访问权限)，或如果应用程序不具有足够的权限来访问它。 is `false` if a queue is already open with exclusive read access (or if it's open with non-exclusive access and this requests exclusive access), or if the application does not have sufficient rights to access it. 如果你的应用程序尝试从队列中读取时是`false`，访问被拒绝。If your application tries to read from a queue when is `false`, access is denied. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个消息队列的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示应用程序是否能够将消息发送到队列。 indicates whether the application is able to send messages to the queue. 如果是`true`，则可以向队列发送消息。If is `true`, the can send messages to the queue. 否则，不能。Otherwise, it cannot. 是`false`如果队列已用独占写访问权限打开 (或如果它是开放的非独占访问，这请求独占访问权限)，或如果应用程序不具有足够的权限来访问它。 is `false` if a queue is already open with exclusive write access (or if it's open with non-exclusive access and this requests exclusive access), or if the application does not have sufficient rights to access it. 如果你的应用程序尝试写入队列时是`false`，访问被拒绝。If your application tries to write to a queue when is `false`, access is denied. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个消息队列的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. summary.span: 获取或设置队列类别。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue category.

value.span: ，表示队列类别（“消息队列”类型标识符），它允许应用程序将其队列分类。

span.span: A that represents the queue category (Message Queuing type identifier), which allows an application to categorize its queues.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 队列类别允许应用程序将其队列分类。The queue category allows an application to categorize its queues. 例如，可以将所有计费队列都放在一个类别和另一个中的所有订单队列中。For example, you can place all Billing queues in one category and all Order queues in another. 属性提供访问权限的消息队列类型 ID 属性 （这是读/写），可通过访问**队列属性**计算机管理控制台中的对话框。The property provides access to the Message Queuing Type ID property (which is read/write), accessible through the **Queue Properties** dialog box in the Computer Management Console. 您可以定义新类别。You can define a new category. 尽管可以使用若要创建跨所有都是唯一的类别值值，此操作是不必要的。Although you can use to create a category value that is unique across all values, such an action is unnecessary. 类别值必须是只能从其他类别，不能从其他所有非重复值。The category value needs to be distinct only from other categories, not from all other values. 例如，您可以将分配{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}作为获取队列的一套并{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}作为为另一组。For example, you can assign {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001} as the for one set of queues and {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002} as the for another set. 不需要设置。It is not necessary to set the . 该值可以为 `null`。The value can be `null`. 设置此属性修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他更改会影响实例。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的值的消息队列的属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#7)]

summary.span: 释放 分配的所有资源。

span.span: Frees all resources allocated by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 释放与关联的所有资源，如果适用，包括共享资源。 frees all resources associated with a , including shared resources if appropriate. 系统自动重新获取这些资源它们是否仍然可用，例如调用方法，如下面的 C# 代码所示。The system re-acquires these resources automatically if they are still available, for example when you call the method, as in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.Send("Text 1."); myMessageQueue.Close(); myMessageQueue.Send("Text 2."); //Resources are re-acquired. ``` 当您调用，则所有用于直接访问消息队列队列的属性会清除。， ， ，和所有保持不变。When you call , all properties that directly access the Message Queuing queue are cleared out. The , , , and all remain as they were. 不会不总是免费读和写到队列，句柄，因为它们可能被共享。 does not always free the read and write handles to a queue, because they might be shared. 您可以采取以下步骤以确保释放到队列的读取和写入句柄：You can take any of the following steps to ensure that frees the read and write handles to a queue: - 创建获得独占访问权限。Create the with exclusive access. 若要执行此操作，调用或构造函数和集`sharedModeDenyReceive`参数`true`。To do so, call the or constructor, and set the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter to `true`. - 创建禁用了连接缓存。Create the with connection caching disabled. 若要执行此操作，调用构造函数和集`enableConnectionCache`参数`false`。To do so, call the constructor and set the `enableConnectionCache` parameter to `false`. - 禁用连接缓存。Disable connection caching. 若要执行此操作，设置属性设置为`false`。To do so, set the property to `false`. 应调用队列删除消息队列服务器上的队列。You should call for a queue before you delete the queue on the Message Queuing server. 否则为发送到队列的消息可能会引发异常或出现在死信队列。Otherwise, messages sent to the queue could throw exceptions or appear in the dead-letter queue. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将关闭消息队列的队列。The following code example closes a Message Queuing queue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便可以通过垃圾回收回收其占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. 应调用发布到最后一个引用之前。You should call before you release your last reference to the . 否则为资源是使用之前，不会释放垃圾回收调用对象的析构函数。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接缓存是对包含读取或写入队列句柄的结构的引用的列表。A connection cache is a list of references to structures that contain read or write handles to queues. 当是`true`，则借用每次调用的句柄从缓存， ，或，而不是打开新的句柄。When is `true`, the borrows handles from the cache each time you call , , or , rather than open new handles. 这可以提高性能。This can improve performance. 使用连接缓存还可隔离从网络拓扑中的更改。Using a connection cache also insulates the from changes in the network topology. 如果您创建与队列的新连接时连接缓存已满，使用新的连接将覆盖最近访问最少的结构。If you create a new connection to a queue when the connection cache is full, the overwrites the least recently accessed structure with the new connection. 您可以完全通过调用清除缓存，例如，如果你正在使用的队列格式名已更改，以便以前的读取和写入句柄不再有效。You can clear the cache entirely by calling , for example, if the format names of the queues you are working with have changed so that the previous read and write handles are no longer valid. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的值的消息队列的属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当指定加密是必需的消息发送到队列时，仅消息正文进行加密。When you specify that encryption is required for the messages sent to a queue, only the message bodies are encrypted. 其他成员 (例如，和属性) 不能被加密。The other members (for example, the and properties) cannot be encrypted. 设置此属性修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他更改会影响实例。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 对消息进行加密会使私有消息。Encrypting a message makes the message private. 您可以指定队列的加密要求`None`， `Body`，或`Optional`通过设置属性正确。You can specify the queue's encryption requirement to be `None`, `Body`, or `Optional` by setting the property appropriately. 消息的设置必须对应于队列的加密要求。The setting of the message must correspond to the encryption requirement of the queue. 如果消息未加密，但队列指定`Body`，或如果对消息进行加密，但队列指定`None`，消息被拒绝的队列。If the message is not encrypted but the queue specifies `Body`, or if the message is encrypted but the queue specifies `None`, the message is rejected by the queue. 如果发送应用程序请求否定确认消息，在这种情况，消息队列指示发送应用程序的消息遭到拒绝。If the sending application requests a negative acknowledgment message in this event, Message Queuing indicates the message's rejection to the sending application. 如果属性是`true`，失败加密的消息发送到死信队列。If the property is `true`, a message that fails encryption is sent to the dead-letter queue. 否则，该消息将丢失。Otherwise, the message is lost. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的值的消息队列的属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. summary.span: 获取“消息队列”在创建队列时生成的唯一队列名。

value.span: 队列的名称，该名称在网络上是唯一的。

span.span: The name for the queue, which is unique on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含队列的格式名称。The property contains the format name of the queue. 消息队列使用格式名称来标识要打开的队列，以及如何对其进行访问。Message Queuing uses the format name to identify which queue to open and how to access it. 与大多数不同的队列的特征，格式名称不是消息队列应用程序队列属性，因此无法访问，通过消息队列管理工具。Unlike most of a queue's characteristics, the format name is not a Message Queuing application queue property, so you cannot access it through the Message Queuing management tool. 格式名是队列，只是唯一的名称创建队列或更高版本生成应用程序时，消息队列生成的。The format name is simply a unique name for the queue, which Message Queuing generates when it creates the queue or which the application generates later. 如果您使用指定路径的路径名称语法 (如`myComputer\myQueue`) 而不是读取或写入队列时，请使用格式名语法，将主域控制器 （它使用 Active Directory）到关联之前访问该队列。If you specify a path using the path name syntax (such as `myComputer\myQueue`) rather than using the format name syntax when you read or write to the queue, the primary domain controller (which uses Active Directory) translates the into the associated before accessing the queue. 如果你的应用程序正在脱机工作，则必须使用格式名语法;否则，主域控制器将不能为执行路径转换。If your application is working offline, you must use the format name syntax; otherwise, the primary domain controller will not be available to perform the path translation. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个消息队列的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含格式化程序对象，该转换时你的应用程序读取或写入队列消息对象的实例。The property contains an instance of a formatter object, which transforms messages when your application reads or writes to the queue. 当应用程序将消息发送到队列时，格式化程序对象序列化为流，并将其插入到消息正文。When the application sends message to the queue, the formatter serializes the object into a stream and inserts it into the message body. 从队列读取时，格式化程序反序列化到消息数据属性的。When reading from a queue, the formatter deserializes the message data into the property of a . 松散耦合的因此不需要具有相同的对象类型上的发送方和接收方时使用此格式。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 和数据序列化为二进制表示形式。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. 并提供更快的吞吐量比。 and provide faster throughput than the . 允许与 Visual Basic 6.0 消息队列应用程序互操作性。The allows interoperability with Visual Basic 6.0 Message Queuing applications. 当你的应用程序将消息发送到队列中，仅应用于使用默认消息属性，这些消息。When your application sends messages to the queue, the applies only to those messages that use the default message properties, . 如果您发送到队列，消息队列使用的格式化程序中定义属性而序列化正文。If you send a to the queue, Message Queuing uses the formatter defined in the property to serialize the body instead. 类将始终使用接收或查看队列的消息。The class will always use a to receive or peek a message from the queue. 该消息使用反序列化属性。The message is deserialized using the property. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了格式设置消息正文使用。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些消息返回队列中的消息，不是动态链接的静态快照。 returns a static snapshot of the messages in the queue, not dynamic links to those messages. 因此，数组不能用于修改在队列中的消息。Therefore, you cannot use the array to modify the messages in the queue. 如果你想与队列 （如删除消息的功能） 的实时、 动态交互，调用方法，它返回队列中消息的动态列表。If you want real-time, dynamic interaction with the queue (such as the ability to delete messages), call the method, which returns a dynamic list of the messages in the queue. 因为调用该方法返回一个队列中消息的副本时，该数组不会反映新到达队列的消息或从队列中删除的消息。Because returns a copy of the messages in the queue at the time the method was called, the array does not reflect new messages that arrive in the queue or messages that are removed from the queue. 仅检索那些未通过筛选出属性。 retrieves only those properties not filtered out by the property. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于两种用途，以及其他计算机的标识符： 读取计算机日志和设置的安全证书。You can use a computer's identifier for two purposes, among others: to read the computer journal and to set security certificates. 但是，不能调用时脱机工作因为应用程序必须有权访问目录服务域控制器上以远程计算机。However, you cannot call for a remote computer when you are working offline because the application must have access to the directory service on the domain controller. 计算机标识符 （或的计算机的标识符） 是消息队列时，创建一台计算机添加到企业。The computer identifier (or machine identifier) is a that Message Queuing creates when a computer is added to the enterprise. 消息队列结合使用计算机标识符`Machine`并`Journal`关键字来创建具有语法的计算机日记格式名称`Machine=;Journal`。Message Queuing combines the computer identifier with the `Machine` and `Journal` keywords to create the machine journal's format name, which has the syntax `Machine=;Journal`. 计算机日记，也称为作为日记队列中，是用于存储副本的系统队列应用程序生成消息何时属性是`true`。The machine journal, which is also known as the journal queue, is a system queue that stores copies of application-generated messages when the property is `true`. 构造队列格式名时，此语法为日志才有效。This syntax for the journal is only valid when constructing the format name for the queue. 路径名称语法`MachineName` \\ `Journal$`。The path name syntax is `MachineName`\\`Journal$`. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|NoNo| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|NoNo| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用 。The following code example calls . [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#14)]

summary.span: 为队列中的所有消息创建枚举数对象。

span.span: Creates an enumerator object for all the messages in the queue.

summary.span: 已弃用。

span.span: is deprecated.

summary.span: 应改用 。

span.span: should be used instead.

returns.span: 该 包括队列中所包含的消息。

span.span: The holding the messages that are contained in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在队列中创建的所有消息的动态列表。 creates a dynamic list of all the messages in a queue. 您可以从队列中删除的消息，以枚举器的当前位置通过调用有关的返回。You can remove from the queue the message at the enumerator's current position by calling for the that returns. 光标位于与队列中的消息动态列表相关联，因为枚举将反映对队列中的消息进行任何修改，如果消息超出了当前光标位置。Because the cursor is associated with the dynamic list of messages in the queue, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to the messages in the queue, if the message is beyond the current cursor position. 例如，枚举器可以自动访问放置光标的当前位置之后的优先级较低的消息，而不是插入该位置之前是优先级较高的邮件。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a lower-priority message placed beyond the cursor's current position, but not a higher-priority message inserted before that position. 但是，您可以重置枚举，从而通过将移动光标返回到列表的开头调用为。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 枚举中消息的顺序反映在队列中，其顺序，因此更高优先级的消息将出现之前优先级较低。The order of the messages in the enumeration reflects their order in the queue, so higher-priority messages will appear before lower-priority ones. 如果您想向其队列而不是动态的连接中消息的静态快照，则调用。If you want a static snapshot of the messages in the queue rather than a dynamic connection to them, call . 此方法返回的数组对象，表示调用了该方法时的消息。This method returns an array of objects, which represent the messages at the time the method was called. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取队列中消息的动态列表和使用的所有消息进行都计数属性设置为。The following code example gets a dynamic list of messages in a queue and counts all messages with the property set to . [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/CPP/mqgetmessageenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/CS/mqgetmessageenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/VB/mqgetmessageenumerator.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在队列中创建的所有消息的动态列表。 creates a dynamic list of all the messages in a queue. 您可以从队列中删除的消息，以枚举器的当前位置通过调用有关的返回。You can remove from the queue the message at the enumerator's current position by calling for the that returns. 光标位于与队列中的消息动态列表相关联，因为枚举将反映对队列中的消息进行任何修改，如果消息超出了当前光标位置。Because the cursor is associated with the dynamic list of messages in the queue, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to the messages in the queue, if the message is beyond the current cursor position. 例如，枚举器可以自动访问放置光标的当前位置之后的优先级较低的消息，而不是插入该位置之前是优先级较高的邮件。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a lower-priority message placed beyond the cursor's current position, but not a higher-priority message inserted before that position. 但是，您可以重置枚举，从而通过将移动光标返回到列表的开头调用为。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 枚举中消息的顺序反映在队列中，其顺序，因此更高优先级的消息将出现之前优先级较低。The order of the messages in the enumeration reflects their order in the queue, so higher-priority messages will appear before lower-priority ones. 如果您想向其队列而不是动态的连接中消息的静态快照，则调用。If you want a static snapshot of the messages in the queue rather than a dynamic connection to them, call . 此方法返回的数组对象，表示调用了该方法时的消息。This method returns an array of objects, which represent the messages at the time the method was called. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator GetMessageQueueEnumerator() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetMessageQueueEnumerator () As MessageQueueEnumerator

summary.span: 提供只进游标语义，以枚举网络上的所有公共队列。

span.span: Provides forward-only cursor semantics to enumerate through all public queues on the network.

returns.span: ，提供网络上所有公共消息队列的动态列表。

span.span: A that provides a dynamic listing of all the public message queues on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载返回位于网络上的所有公共队列的枚举。This overload of returns an enumeration of all the public queues that are on the network. 由于游标与动态列表相关联，则枚举反映对删除或添加游标的当前位置之后的队列的队列列表进行任何修改。Because the cursor is associated with a dynamic listing, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to a queue list for queues deleted or added beyond the cursor's current position. 添加或删除队列位于光标的当前位置之前不会反映。Additions or deletion of queues located before the cursor's current position are not reflected. 例如，枚举器可以自动访问超出游标位置追加一个队列而不是之前该位置插入。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a queue appended beyond the cursor position but not one inserted before that position. 但是，您可以重置枚举，从而通过将移动光标返回到列表的开头调用为。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 没有任何已定义的排序的网络中的队列。There is no defined ordering of queues in a network. 一个枚举器不会不将它们排序，例如，通过计算机、 标签、 公共或私有状态或任何其他可访问的条件。An enumerator does not order them, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or any other accessible criteria. 如果你想在网络而不是它们的动态连接上的队列的静态快照，则调用或。If you want a static snapshot of the queues on the network rather than a dynamic connection to them, call or . 这两种方法的每个返回的数组对象，表示调用了该方法时的队列。Each of these two methods returns an array of objects, which represent the queues at the time the method was called. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|NoNo| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|NoNo| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例循环访问在网络中的所有消息队列，并检查每个队列的路径。The following code example iterates through all the message queues in the network, and examines the path for each queue. 最后，它显示在网络上的公共队列数。Finally, it displays the number of public queues on the network. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CPP/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CS/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/VB/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载返回满足条件的应用程序条件中定义的网络上的所有公共队列的列表。This overload of returns a listing of all the public queues on the network that satisfy criteria defined in the application criteria. 您可以指定的条件来包括，例如，队列创建或修改时间、 计算机名称、 标签、 类别或这些项的组合。You can specify the criteria to include, for example, queue creation or modification time, computer name, label, category, or any combination of these. 由于游标与动态列表相关联，则枚举反映对游标的当前位置之后发生的队列进行任何修改。Because the cursor is associated with a dynamic listing, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to a queue that occurs beyond the cursor's current position. 不会反映对队列位于光标的当前位置之前的更改。Changes to queues located before the cursor's current position are not reflected. 例如，枚举器可以自动访问超出游标位置追加一个队列而不是之前该位置插入。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a queue appended beyond the cursor position but not one inserted before that position. 但是，您可以重置枚举，从而通过将移动光标返回到列表的开头调用为。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 没有任何已定义的排序的网络中的队列。There is no defined ordering of queues in a network. 一个枚举器不会不将它们排序，例如，通过计算机、 标签、 公共或私有状态或任何其他可访问的条件。An enumerator does not order them, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or any other accessible criteria. 如果你希望网络而不是它们的动态连接上的队列的静态快照，指定的条件或致电。If you want a static snapshot of the queues on the network rather than a dynamic connection to them, specify criteria for or call . 这两种方法的每个返回的数组对象，表示调用了该方法时的队列。Each of these two methods returns an array of objects, which represent the queues at the time the method was called. 调用， ，或提供了相同的结果与调用使用的筛选条件， ，和分别。Calling , , or provides the same results as calling with the filtering criteria of , , and , respectively. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|NoNo| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|NoNo| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例循环访问消息队列，并显示计算机"MyComputer"上的每个队列中的最后一天的已创建和存在的路径。The following code example iterates through message queues and displays the path of each queue that was created in the last day and that exists on the computer "MyComputer". remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持两种类型的消息检索： 同步和异步。 supports two types of message retrieval: synchronous and asynchronous. 同步方法和，会导致进程线程等待新消息到达队列中指定的时间间隔。The synchronous methods, and , cause the process thread to wait a specified time interval for a new message to arrive in the queue. 如果指定的时间间隔是，直到有可用的新消息将一直被阻止的进程线程。If the specified time interval is , the process thread remains blocked until a new message is available. 但是，和（异步方法），允许以继续在另一个线程，直到有消息到达队列中的主应用程序任务。On the other hand, and (the asynchronous methods), allow the main application tasks to continue in a separate thread until a message arrives in the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of the member. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是必不可少的组成部分的队列的友好名称语法。The is an integral component of the friendly name syntax of the queue . 下表显示了当你想要确定使用友好名称的队列路径时应使用指定类型的队列的语法。The following table shows the syntax you should use for a queue of a specified type when you want to identify the queue path using its friendly name. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日记队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日志队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 使用"。"本地计算机时指定。Use "." for the local computer when specifying the . 例如，对于此属性，识别仅计算机名称`Server0`。Only the computer name is recognized for this property, for example, `Server0`. 属性不支持 IP 地址格式。The property does not support the IP address format. 如果定义了的，应用程序将引发异常，因为域控制器是路径翻译需要脱机工作时。If you define the in terms of the , the application throws an exception when working offline because the domain controller is required for path translation. 因此，必须使用为脱机工作时的语法。Therefore, you must use the for the syntax when working offline. ， ，和相关的属性。The , , and properties are related. 更改属性会导致要更改属性。Changing the property causes the property to change. 从新构建和。It is built from the new and the . 更改（例如，若要使用的格式名称语法） 将重置和属性来引用新队列。Changing the (for example, to use the format name syntax) resets the and properties to refer to the new queue. 如果属性为空，设置为指定的计算机的日志队列。If the property is empty, the is set to the Journal queue of the computer you specify. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接可以访问消息队列消息存储限额，这不同于计算机的管理员定义的消息配额。The provides access to the Message Queuing message storage limit, which is separate from the computer's message quota that the administrator defines. 有关消息配额的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the message quota, see . 设置此属性修改消息队列队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他更改会影响实例Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change 如果试图超过最大队列大小或的计算机的消息配额，则消息可能会丢失。If an attempt is made to exceed either the maximum queue size or the computer message quota, messages might be lost. 当达到队列配额时，消息队列通知发送的应用程序，以指示该队列已满，通过返回一个否定确认消息的管理队列。When the queue quota is reached, Message Queuing notifies the administration queue of the sending application to indicate that the queue is full, by returning a negative acknowledgment message. 消息队列仍会继续发送否定确认，直到队列中消息的总大小降低到限制。Message Queuing continues to send negative acknowledgments until the total size of the messages in the queue drops below the limit. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的值的消息队列的属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#22)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此筛选器是一组限制消息属性的布尔值的接收或查看。This filter is a set of Boolean values restricting the message properties that the receives or peeks. 当接收或查看消息从服务器队列中，它仅检索那些为其值是`true`。When the receives or peeks a message from the server queue, it retrieves only those properties for which the value is `true`. 以下显示的初始属性值属性。The following shows initial property values for the property. 这些设置是相当于调用上。These settings are identical to calling on a . |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||1024 个字节1024 bytes| ||255 个字节255 bytes| ||255 个字节255 bytes| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来限制接收的消息属性。The following code example uses the to restrict the message properties received. summary.span: 获取或设置与队列关联的多路广播地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the multicast address associated with the queue.

Docs.value:
包含有效的多路广播地址（格式如下）的 ，或者为 ，这表示队列与多路广播地址不关联。A that contains a valid multicast address (in the form shown below) or , which indicates that the queue is not associated with a multicast address.
``` <address>:<port> ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于将非事务性队列发送消息时可以使用的多播地址与相关联。The property is used to associate a non-transactional queue with a multicast address that can be used when sending messages. 不能将事务性队列与多播地址相关联。You cannot associate a transactional queue with a multicast address. 当发送应用程序将消息发送到多播地址时，消息队列将消息的副本发送到与该地址相关联的每个队列。When the sending application sends messages to a multicast address, Message Queuing sends a copy of the message to every queue associated with that address. IP 多播地址必须位于类 D 范围介于 224.0.0.0 到 239.255.255.255，对应于等于 1110年的前四个高阶位设置。IP multicast addresses must be in the class D range from 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255, which corresponds to setting the first four high-order bits equal to 1110. 但是，只有特定范围的此范围内的地址是保留的可用于发送多播的消息。However, only certain ranges of addresses in this range are unreserved and available for sending multicast messages. 保留的多播地址的最新列表，请参阅[Internet 分配号机构 (IANA) Internet 多播地址](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=3859)网页。For the latest list of reserved multicast addresses, see the [Internet Assigned Number Authority (IANA) Internet Multicast Addresses](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=3859) Web page. 没有任何限制上的端口号。There are no restrictions on the port number. 如果多个源计算机发送多播的消息，并且你想要从只有一台源计算机接收消息的特定队列，每台源计算机必须向不同的 IP 地址和端口号组合发送消息。If several source computers are sending multicast messages and you want a specific queue to receive messages from only one source computer, each source computer must send messages to a different combination of IP address and port number. 若要取消关联的多播地址从一个队列，设置属性设置为零长度字符串。To dissociate a queue from a multicast address, set the property to a zero-length string. 不将其设置为`null`，因为这将导致。Do not set it to `null`, as this will result in a . 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语法属性取决于队列的类型它点为下表中所示。The syntax for the property depends on the type of queue it points to, as shown in the following table. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日记队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日志队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 使用"。"来表示本地计算机。Use "." to represent the local computer. ， ，和相关的属性。The , , and properties are related. 更改属性会导致要更改属性。Changing the property causes the property to change. 从新构建和。It is built from the new and the . 更改（例如，若要使用的格式名称语法） 将重置和属性来引用新队列。Changing the (for example, to use the format name syntax) resets the and properties to refer to the new queue. 或者，可以使用或来描述的队列路径下, 表中所示。Alternatively, you can use the or to describe the queue path, as shown in the following table. |参考Reference|语法Syntax|示例Example| |---------------|------------|-------------| |格式名称Format name|`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]|`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112| |LabelLabel|`Label:` [ *label* ]`Label:` [ *label* ]|`Label:` TheLabel`Label:` TheLabel| 如果使用的标签语法属性发送消息时，将引发异常，如果不是唯一的。If you use the label syntax for the property when you send the message, an exception will be thrown if the is not unique. 若要脱机工作，必须在第一个表中使用格式名语法，而不是友好名称语法。To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, rather than the friendly name syntax in the first table. 否则，因为主域控制器 （Active Directory 所在） 不是可用于将路径解析为格式名，将引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller (on which Active Directory resides) is not available to resolve the path to the format name. 设置新路径关闭消息队列，并释放所有句柄。Setting a new path closes the message queue and releases all handles. 下表显示了此属性是否可在各种工作组模式下。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| > [!NOTE] > 在工作组模式下只能使用专用队列。In workgroup mode you can only use private queues. 指定在路径中使用的专用队列语法`MachineName` \\ `Private$` \\ `QueueName`。You specify the path using the private queue syntax `MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建新对象使用各种路径名称语法类型。The following code example creates new objects using various path name syntax types. 每种情况下，它将一条消息发送到队列的构造函数中定义的路径。In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CPP/mqpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CS/mqpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/VB/mqpath.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message Peek() cil managed

summary.span: 返回但不移除（查看）此 所引用的队列中的第一条消息。

span.span: Returns without removing (peeks) the first message in the queue referenced by this .

summary.span: 方法是同步的，所以在有可用消息前，该方法阻塞当前线程。

span.span: The method is synchronous, so it blocks the current thread until a message becomes available.

returns.span: 该 表示队列中第一条消息。

span.span: The that represents the first message in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要查看队列，或等待，直到在队列中存在一条消息，请使用此重载。Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait until a message exists in the queue. 方法读取，但不会删除队列中的第一个消息。The method reads, but does not remove, the first message from the queue. 因此，重复调用返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。Therefore, repeated calls to return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 方法，但是，读取并从队列中移除第一条消息。The method, on the other hand, both reads and removes the first message from the queue. 重复调用，因此，返回不同的消息。Repeated calls to , therefore, return different messages. 消息队列的优先级和到达时间根据队列中进行排序的消息。Message Queuing orders messages in the queue according to priority and arrival time. 仅当优先级较高，较新消息放旧的前面。A newer message is placed before an older one only if it is of a higher priority. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 此重载不指定超时，因为该应用程序可能会无限期等待。Because this overload does not specify a time-out, the application might wait indefinitely. 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. 或者，可以指定要使用的重载到达队列的消息的超时值指定超时。Alternatively, you can specify a time-out for a message to arrive in the queue by using the overload of that specifies a time-out. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的示例使用队列上的方法。The following examples use the method on a queue. 在第一个示例中，应用程序等待，直到有可用的队列中消息。In the first example, the application waits until a message becomes available in the queue. 请注意第一个示例不会访问的消息的到达;它只是暂停处理直到有消息到达。Note that the first example does not access the message that arrives; it merely pauses processing until a message arrives. 如果在队列中已存在一条消息，它将立即返回。If a message already exists in the queue, it will return immediately. 在第二个示例中，包含应用程序定义的消息`Order`类是发送到队列，，然后从队列中查看。In the second example, a message that contains an application-defined `Order` class is sent to the queue, and then peeked from the queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Peek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_noparms/CPP/mqpeek_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Peek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_noparms/CS/mqpeek_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Peek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_noparms/VB/mqpeek_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要查看队列，或等待一段指定时间，直到在队列中存在一条消息，请使用此重载。Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait a specified period of time until a message exists in the queue. 如果消息在队列中已存在，方法将立即返回。The method returns immediately if a message already exists in the queue. 方法读取，但不会删除队列中的第一个消息。The method reads, but does not remove, the first message from the queue. 因此，重复调用返回相同的消息，除非较高优先级的消息到达队列中。Therefore, repeated calls to return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 方法，但是，读取并从队列中移除第一条消息。The method, on the other hand, both reads and removes the first message from the queue. 重复调用，因此，返回不同的消息。Repeated calls to , therefore, return different messages. 消息队列的优先级和到达时间根据队列中进行排序的消息。Message Queuing orders messages in the queue according to priority and arrival time. 仅当优先级较高，较新消息放旧的前面。A newer message is placed before an older one only if it is of a higher priority. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 线程将阻塞段指定的时间，或者如果您指示。The thread will be blocked up to the specified period of time, or indefinitely if you indicated . 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法的超时值为零，以检查队列是否为空。The following code example uses the method with a time-out of zero to check whether the queue is empty. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Peek_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_timeout/CPP/mqpeek_timeout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Peek_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_timeout/CS/mqpeek_timeout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Peek_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_timeout/VB/mqpeek_timeout.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要查看队列，或等待一段指定时间，直到在队列中存在一条消息，请使用此重载。Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait a specified period of time until a message exists in the queue. 如果消息在队列中已存在，方法将立即返回。The method returns immediately if a message already exists in the queue. 方法读取，但不会删除队列的消息。The method reads, but does not remove, a message from the queue. 方法，但是，读取并从队列中删除一条消息。The method, on the other hand, both reads and removes a message from the queue. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 线程阻塞段指定的时间，或者如果您指示。The thread is blocked up to the specified period of time, or indefinitely if you indicated . 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法中引用的队列中查找消息其匹配指定`correlationId`参数。This method looks in the queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果未找到消息相匹配`correlationID`参数，将引发异常。If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, an exception is thrown. 属性用于将绑定到队列相关联的响应、 报表或确认消息发送到发送的消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 其他两种方法可以查看队列中的消息。Two other methods allow you to peek messages in a queue. 方法在队列中，将返回第一条消息和方法用于检索一条消息，通过指定它的唯一标识符。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收包含订单到和从队列的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 它专门请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法中引用的队列中查找消息其匹配指定`correlationId`参数。This method looks in the queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果未找到消息相匹配`correlationID`参数，并且没有新消息到达队列中指定的时期内`timeout`参数，将引发异常。If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, and no new message arrives in the queue within the period specified by the `timeout` parameter, an exception is thrown. `timeout`参数未指定的总运行时间为此方法。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定为新消息到达队列中等待的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次有新消息到达时，此方法将检查的新消息，以查看其是否符合`correlationId`参数。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `correlationId` parameter. 如果没有，此方法通过启动的超时期限，等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息继续到达在超时期内，就可以为此方法以继续无限期运行直到超时期限到期且无需任何新消息到达，或者直到有消息到达其匹配`correlationId`参数。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `correlationId` parameter. 属性用于将绑定到队列相关联的响应、 报表或确认消息发送到发送的消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 其他两种方法可以查看队列中的消息。Two other methods allow you to peek messages in a queue. 方法在队列中，将返回第一条消息和方法用于检索一条消息，通过指定它的唯一标识符。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用读取，不从队列中删除具有已知的消息标识符的消息。Use to read, without removing from the queue, a message that has a known message identifier. 一条消息的标识符是整个消息队列企业内、 唯一的因此将有最多一条消息中的队列的匹配给定`id`参数。The identifier of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 如果队列中当前不包含该消息，此重载将引发异常。This overload throws an exception if the queue does not currently contain the message. 两个其他方法使您得以在队列中扫视消息：和。Two additional methods allow you to peek messages in a queue: and . 方法返回的第一个消息队列; 中返回确认、 报表或已创建第一条消息发送到队列的应用程序生成的响应消息。The method returns the first message in the queue; returns an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue. 下表显示了此方法是在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式下Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机并直接格式名Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理过程中用来发出事件队列中出现一条消息时。 is used in asynchronous processing to raise the event when a message is available in the queue. 用于完成通过调用启动的操作和扫视消息时引发事件。 is used to complete the operation initiated by a call to and peek the message when the event is raised. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建名为一个事件处理程序`MyPeekCompleted`，将其附加到事件处理程序委托，然后调用启动异步查看操作上的队列的路径处"。 \myQueue"。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 当引发事件，该示例查看的消息并将其正文写入到屏幕。When a event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen. 该示例然后调用再次以启动新的异步查看操作The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CPP/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CS/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/VB/mqbeginpeek_noparms.vb#1)]
